goal.en: Strengthen students‘ basic concepts of fluid mechanics and how to apply these concepts to practical engineering problems
goal.ch: 強化學生流體力學基本概念及如何把基本觀念應用於實際工程問題

content.en:
Chapter 1: Introduction
Chapter 2: Fluid Statics
Chapter 3: Fluid Kinematics
Chapter 4: Elementary Fluid Dynamics-The Bernoulli Equation
Chapter 5: Finite Control Volume Analysis
Chapter 6: Differential Analysis of Fluid Flow
Chapter 7: Dimensional Analysis, Similitude, and Modeling
Chapter 8: Viscous Flow in Pipes (Option)
Chapter 9: Flow over Immersed Bodies (Option)
content.ch:
Chapter 1: Introduction
Chapter 2: Fluid Statics
Chapter 3: Fluid Kinematics
Chapter 4: Elementary Fluid Dynamics-The Bernoulli Equation
Chapter 5: Finite Control Volume Analysis
Chapter 6: Differential Analysis of Fluid Flow
Chapter 7: Dimensional Analysis, Similitude, and Modeling
Chapter 8: Viscous Flow in Pipes (Option)
Chapter 9: Flow over Immersed Bodies (Option)

textbook.en: Munson, Young, and Okiishi, Fundamentals of Fluid Mechanics, 9th Edition, John Wiley ＆ Sons. References: 1. White, Fluid Mechanics, 8th Edition, McGraw-Hill. 2. Fox and McDonald, Introduction to Fluid Mechanics, 10th Edition. John Wiely ＆ Sons.
textbook.ch: Munson, Young, and Okiishi, Fundamentals of Fluid Mechanics, 9th Edition, John Wiley ＆ Sons. 參考書本: 1. White, Fluid Mechanics, 8th Edition, McGraw-Hill. 2. Fox and McDonald, Introduction to Fluid Mechanics, 10th Edition. John Wiely ＆ Sons.

grading.en: Homework and Attendance (10％) Two Mid-Term Exams (2×30％) Final Exam (30％)
grading.ch: Homework and Attendance (10％) Two Mid-Term Exams (2×30％) Final Exam (30％)

domain.en: 基礎學科 、 設計與分析
domain.ch: 基礎學科 、 設計與分析

en.competency: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation
